statements: UPDATE network_outages SET severity = 'HIGH', duration = '1 day' WHERE outage_id = 101;
UPDATE network_outages SET start_time = '2022-05-15 08:00:00', location = 'Data Center A', incident_report = 'Power outage caused by lightning strike' WHERE outage_id = 102;
UPDATE network_outages SET duration = '2 days' WHERE outage_id = 1;
UPDATE network_outages SET severity = 'HIGH', location = 'Data Center' WHERE start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_description = 'Network connectivity issue' WHERE outage_id = 1;
UPDATE network_failures SET failure_description = 'Server outage' WHERE failure_id = 3;
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_description = 'Power outage' WHERE outage_id = 1;
UPDATE network_failures SET failure_description = 'Server failure' WHERE failure_id = 3;
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_description = 'Planned maintenance outage' WHERE outage_id = 1;
UPDATE network_failures SET failure_details = 'Power failure at data center' WHERE failure_id = 2;
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_description = 'Power outage' WHERE outage_id = 1;
UPDATE network_failures SET failure_details = 'Database failure' WHERE failure_id = 3;
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_reason = 'Power Failure' WHERE start_time = '2023-05-15 10:00:00'
UPDATE network_failures SET failure_description = 'Hardware failure' WHERE failure_id = 1001
UPDATE network_outages SET outage_reason='Power failure', affected_services='Internet, Email' WHERE start_time='2022-01-15 08:00:00' AND end_time='2022-01-15 09:30:00';
UPDATE incident_analysis SET analysis_results='Root cause identified as hardware malfunction', incident_time='2022-02-20 15:45:00' WHERE affected_network_element='Router A';
UPDATE network_outages SET start_time = '2022-06-15 08:30:00', affected_network = 'Network A' WHERE outage_id = 12345;
UPDATE failure_analysis SET failure_description = 'Power outage caused by electrical fault.', analyst_name = 'John Doe' WHERE analysis_id = 54321;
UPDATE network_outages SET end_time = '2021-08-15 12:00:00' WHERE outage_id = 101;
UPDATE failure_analysis SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', failure_description = 'Critical Failure' WHERE analysis_id = 201;
